input.sentences: the family went on a trip today .
they took a picture in front of the statute .
they took a picture that looked like they were under the statute .
they took a picture of the state .
finally they stopped and rested with the dog .
output.sentences: We went on a family trip.
We decided to take a picture standing in front of a statue.
THen we took another picture at a statue and looked down at the camera.
After, we just took a picture of it.
We finally stopped to rest as a family.
